name: Murder of Jim Greengrocer
description:
You're a special detective. Your new case is Murder of Jim Greengrocer. You have a week to figure out the crinimals. Who's the killer? Who helped the killer? Can you rewind the time in your mind to find?

This indie detective game was made in a week for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 (https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4).
Unity Game Engine 2019.4 (LTS) was used to create.
Blender 2.8 was used to modelling.
Photoshop CS6 was used to create textures.

Gameplay:
